value.title: Reduce the queries being sent with Incremental Refresh in Power BI!
value.excerpt: Have you noticed some extra queries being sent when using Incremental Refresh in Power BI? Patrick explains why this could happen and a potential workaround.  Privacy Levels:  https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/enterprise/desktop-privacy-levels  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Reset a streaming dataset in Power BI (Minute Monday)
value.excerpt: In this Minute Monday, Patrick shows you how to reset data that is within a streaming datset in Power BI. He figured this out when trying to setup a demo with a streaming dataset and then wanting to start over.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: Row-Level Security in Power BI - Revisited
value.excerpt: We had some recent changes to Row-level security in Power BI. Row-level security (RLS) was moved to be configured in Power BI Desktop with the June 2016 release.  I walk through how you could can configure this now in Power BI Desktop. I also talk about some of the limitations.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in

value.title: Setting default values using COALESCE in DAX
value.excerpt: Learn how to get default values using the DAX COALESCE function instead of IF statements. A great way to avoid BLANK in Power BI!  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/dax/coalesce-function-dax  SQLBI.com article:  https://sql.bi/659297   游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************

value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the Filter Context using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it뗩 Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)
